header.title: Drops
header.subtext: Informed decisions, reduced lead time and faster deliveries to support brands, retailers and designers. Buy Sutainably and transparently

blocks.title: Speed up the supply-chain
blocks.content:
* Order ready-to-ship styles
* Low MOQs(as from 10 pieces)
* Receive delivery within a week

blocks.title: Make informed decisions
blocks.content:
* Buy closer to season
* Reduce inventory & markdow risk
* Replenish best-sellers
